greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Characteristic function of numbers that are divisible by the product of their digits.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000 (corrected by _Georg Fischer_, Jan 20 2019)
maple: isA007602 := proc(n) if A007954(n) = 0 then false; else `if`(n mod A007954(n) = 0,true,false) ; end if; end proc:
A188642 := proc(n) if isA007602(n) then 1; else 0 ; end if ; end proc:
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 07 2011
